item.title: Same Old Topics
item.description: I haven't been posting about specific CS teaching techniques and lesson content recently. Probably because I've been teaching the same classes at Hunter now for the past six years. Twice a year, Fall and Spring, I teach a recitation for Hunter's CS1 in C++. In the Fall I also teach a version of their CS0 in Python. My second undergrad CS class in the Spring is Data Structures. I have some freedom in the CS0 class but that's more with applications and assignments since the basics are the basics.
